resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Sign up
E-mail and password do not correspond to a registered user
Are you sure you want to delete the class?
Are you sure you want to delete the task?
The new password is too short!

This page is for users to log into their accounts. To log in you must enter your credentials (email and password). The credentials are entered in the text boxes and to log into the account, simply click on the \"Log in\" button.

"To register a new account, the user must click on the underlined text, as shown in the image. By clicking on the text the user is redirected to the registration page. When the user is on the registration page he has to enter his name, email, password and confirmation of the password. The password must be at least 6 characters long. "

On this page the user will have a search box to look for a specific news item. The news are listed with its respective image, title, source and how many hours it was published. If the user wants to read a news story, just click on it and the website will appear, as shown on the second image. By pressing the news item for a while the link to the website is automatically copied to the clipboard.

On this page the user can create assignments by entering the course, assignment and due date. When creating the assignments they will be automatically listed, the user will be able to edit, delete and check if the assignment has already been done. If you need to create, edit or delete a task, swipe down.

To create a new task, simply click on the round button in the lower right corner. Then a pop-up window will appear, and you can enter all the fields (subject, task and date), the date is automatically filled in with the current day. If you want to change the date, you can change it manually or click on the button with a calendar icon and a calendar will appear to select the day, month and year. If the user wants to set a reminder they will have to click on the icon of the bell, then two pop-ups will appear one to select the day and another to select the time. Finally just save and the task will appear listed.

To edit a task, simply click on the task and a pop-up will appear with the selected task data. Then just change the fields you want and save. If the user wants to set a reminder, they will have to click on the icon of the bell and two pop-ups will appear one to select the day and another to select the time.
To delete a task, simply drag the task you want to delete to the right or left, then a confirmation pop-up will appear. When you confirm the task will be deleted.
To put a task already done, just hold down the task for a while and the checkbox is automatically activated. If the user wants to change the task to not done, just do the same.
Select the day of the week

On this page the user will have to select the day of the week, then he will be redirected to that day\'s page and only then he will be able to add a subject, room and times (start and end). The user can create, update and delete classes.

To create a new lesson, just click on the round button in the lower right corner. Then a popup will appear, then just fill in the subject and room, to enter the time, the user has to click on the time buttons and a popup will appear to select the time. Then just save and the lesson will be listed.
To edit the lesson, just click on the lesson you want to edit. Then a pop-up window will appear with the data of the lesson. Then just change the data you want to change and save.
On this page the user will be able to see his or her username and email address. They will also be able to change their password and log out.

To change the password just click on the change password button, then a pop-up will appear. As is shown in the first image you need to enter the current password, the new one and repeat. When you change it, a success message will appear and a pop-up with a message saying that the session will be terminated.
To logout simply click the logout button, then a confirmation pop-up will appear and upon confirmation the user logs out and is redirected to the login page.
To delete a lesson, simply drag the lesson you want to delete to the right or left, then a confirmation pop-up will appear. When you confirm the task will be deleted.
